text: The women's 4 × 195 metres relay event at the 1969 European Indoor Games was held on 9 March in Belgrade. Each athlete ran one lap of the 195 metres track. ==Results== {| class="wikitable sortable" style="text-align:center; font- size:95%" |- !Rank !Nation !Competitors !Time !Notes |- | ||align=left| ||align=left|Odette Ducas Sylviane Telliez Colette Besson Christiane Martinetto || 1:34.3 || |- | ||align=left| ||align=left|Galina Bukharina Vera Popkova Lyudmila Golomazova Lyudmila Samotyosova || 1:34.6 || |- | ||align=left| ||align=left|Darja Marolt Verica Ambrozi Ljiljana Petnjarić Marijana Lubej || 1:36.9 || |- | 4 ||align=left| ||align=left|Inge Aigner Maria Sykora Liesel Prokop Hanna Kleinpeter || 1:42.0 || |} ==References== Category:4 × 400 metres relay at the European Athletics Indoor Championships Relay
title: 1969 European Indoor Games – Women's 4 × 195 metres relay
